comments.content: Looks to me like various weights of David Berlow’s Titling Gothic (including [Skyline Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825081543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_skyline_bold_ot/ot_ps/specimen/tester/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=70&sample_text=ANDERS%20FJELSTED&ft=liga), [Compressed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825081543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_compressed_bold/pc_tt/specimen/tester/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=120&sample_text=VOKSEN&ft=liga) and [Compressed Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825081543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_compressed_medium_ot/ot_ps/specimen/tester/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=70&sample_text=10.%20%2B%2012.%20%2B%2013.%20%2B%2014.&ft=liga)).

Closest I found was David Berlow’s Titling Gothic Compressed Bold [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/titling\_gothic\_compr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825081543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_compressed_bold/pc_tt/specimen/tester/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/titling\_gothic\_compressed\_bold/pc\_tt/specimen/tester/") but that's still not 100%.  
Don
I don’t see any differences (except for spacing).

Edited:  
Closer to big title when compressed to 90%

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825081543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TitlingGothicBoldExtraComp1_5863.jpg)
  
Don

edited:  
On closer examination, I would go with Titling Gothic Skyline Bold -- as suggested by R -- for the top line and the date, and Titling Gothic Compressed Bold edited to be further compressed to 90% for the big letters in the second line. As shown in my previous post.  
Done

As I said before, I can’t see any differences between the letters used on the poster and the weights I mentioned above (and one additional weight):  
– Wide Regular or Medium for ‘FBI PROUDLY PRESENTS’  
– Skyline Bold for ‘ANDERS FJELSTED etc.’/‘COMEDY ZOO’/‘JUNI 2014’  
– Compressed Bold for ‘VOKSEN’  
– Compressed Medium for ‘FJELLE SOLO PÅ’/‘10. + 12. + 13. + 14.’

The spacing has been tightened for all texts, but an overlay of the letters on the poster with the ones from the FontShop preview shows that they perfectly coincide.
